HERO.TITLE: Download all Threads contents in your preferred format!

DESCRIPTION.GRATIS-TEXT: Use Threads Downloader to download for free with no ads. Our site offers an ad-free download experience, ensuring maximum convenience for users.
DESCRIPTION.VELOCE-TEXT: Download your favorite videos from Threads in two clicks! Threads Downloader offers fast downloads for a seamless experience.
DESCRIPTION.SICURO-TEXT: Reliability and security come first on Threads Downloader. Download your videos and images from Threads with the peace of mind of a secure and protected connection.,
DESCRIPTION.NESSUN-LIMITE-TEXT: Make the most of Threads Downloader's potential: our site offers unlimited downloading of videos and images from Threads. No restrictions, download whatever you want, whenever you want.
DESCRIPTION.NESSUNA-REGISTRAZIONE-TEXT: With Threads Downloader, downloading videos and images from Threads is simple and doesn't require registration. You can instantly access a fast and uninterrupted download service.,
DESCRIPTION.COMPATIBILE-TEXT: Threads Downloader is the perfect solution for downloading videos and images from Threads on any device. Our platform is compatible with all devices.

DETAILS.BENVENUTI-TEXT: Welcome to ThreadsDownloader, your ideal companion for downloading videos and images from Threads. Our platform is designed to offer you an extraordinarily fast and smooth experience.
DETAILS.COME-FARE-TEXT: To download the desired videos and images, simply paste the URL or link of the video and click Download, all for free and with no limits. Your security is at the core of our concerns, so we ensure a safe environment for your downloads. Plus, no registration is required, allowing you instant access to the service.
DETAILS.COMODITA: And the convenience doesn't end there!
DETAILS.COMODITA-TEXT: ThreadsDownloader is compatible with all devices, ensuring an optimal experience on smartphones, tablets, and computers. Meet your download needs with ease and versatility thanks to Threads Downloader, your reliable companion for capturing videos from Threads. Start today!
DETAILS.DOWN-TIP-TEXT: Interested in downloading a video from Threads? Change the URL in the address bar from Threads threads.net/... to threadsdownloader.social/api/download?url=threads.net/... and download your content!

FAQ.HEAD: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.RESP-1A: ThreadsDownloader is a free online tool that allows you to download videos or images from Threads in your preferred format.
FAQ.RESP-2A: Simply go to a video or image on Threads and copy/paste the link into the ThreadsDownloader homepage, selecting your preferred format.
FAQ.RESP-3A: No, registration is not required. We aim to make using our site as simple as possible.
FAQ.QUEST-4A: Can I use ThreadsDownloader on smartphones/tablets?
FAQ.RESP-4A: The ThreadsDownloader site is responsive, so you can use it on your choice of device, whether it's a PC, Mac, tablet, or mobile phone.
FAQ.QUEST-5A: I downloaded a video, but I have an issue with the video or audio playback.
FAQ.RESP-5A: If your video download was successful but you encounter an issue with the audio, video, or even an error upon opening, we recommend installing the VLC Media Player, which is completely free and compatible with PCs, Macs, mobile phones, and tablets. It can help you resolve any playback issues.
FAQ.QUEST-6A: Is it possible to download videos with subtitles?
FAQ.RESP-6A: Yes, it's entirely possible to download a video with subtitles.
FAQ.QUEST-7A: Where do I find the downloaded file once it's completed?
FAQ.RESP-7A: Usually, the file ends up in the Downloads folder on your device, but this can vary in some cases. If you need assistance, try searching on Google or asking someone you know who can guide you to the folder.
FAQ.QUEST-8A: Why can't I click the download button to start the download?
FAQ.RESP-8A: In most cases, this means your browser is not up to date. We recommend updating it or installing the Firefox browser if the issue persists. If the problem is still not resolved, don't hesitate to contact us.
FAQ.RESP-9A: Certainly, exchanges between you and ThreadsDownloader are encrypted using an SSL certificate. For your privacy, we do not keep any record of the downloads you mak
FAQ.QUEST-10A: I encountered a bug or want to report an improvement!
FAQ.RESP-10A: For suggestions or bug reports, you can contact us by clicking here.
FAQ.QUEST-1B: How many files can I download?
FAQ.RESP-1B: As many as you want. There is no limit to the number of files you can download.
FAQ.QUEST-2B: How long is the download link valid?
FAQ.RESP-2B: Download links expire after 20 minutes. Feel free to retry a download if your link has expired.
FAQ.RESP-3B: Currently, ThreadsDownloader supports MP4 HD and JPG. However, you can contact us with suggestions for additions!
FAQ.QUEST-4B: What is the quality of the downloaded file?
FAQ.RESP-4B: The quality of the downloaded files is 1080P for MP4 HD files
FAQ.QUEST-5B: What can be the maximum size of a video to download?
FAQ.RESP-5B: There is no maximum size for a video to download.
FAQ.QUEST-6B: Is it possible to download a live video?
FAQ.RESP-6B: Currently, it's not possible to download a video from a live stream.
FAQ.QUEST-7B: I receive the message this video is protected by copyright!
FAQ.RESP-7B: This message is completely normal. You are trying to download content that is protected by copyright, and ThreadsDownloader does not allow it. We make every effort to block the download of copyrighted content to ensure the continued existence of the site.

PRIVACY-POLICY.HEAD: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY-POLICY.HEAD-TEXT: Please take a moment to familiarize yourself with our privacy practices and contact us if you have any questions.
PRIVACY-POLICY.PERS-ID-TEXT: We may collect personal identification information from Users in a variety of ways, including, but not limited to, when Users visit our site, fill out a form, and in connection with other activities, services, features or resources we make available on our Site. Users may visit our Site anonymously. We will collect personal identification information from Users only if they voluntarily submit such information to us. Users can always refuse to supply personally identification information, except that it may prevent them from engaging in certain Site related activities.
PRIVACY-POLICY.NON-PERS-ID-TEXT: We may collect non-personal identification information about Users whenever they interact with our Site. Non-personal identification information may include the browser name, the type of computer and technical information about Users means of connection to our Site, such as the operating system and the Internet service providers utilized and other similar information. We may collect non-personal identification information about Users whenever they interact with our Site. Non-personal identification information may include the browser name, the type of computer and technical information about Users means of connection to our Site, such as the operating system and the Internet service providers utilized and other similar information.
PRIVACY-POLICY.COOKIES-TEXT: We may collect non-personal identification information about Users whenever they interact with our Site. Non-personal identification information may include the browser name, the type of computer and technical information about Users means of connection to our Site, such as the operating system and the Internet service providers utilized and other similar information. We may collect non-personal identification information about Users whenever they interact with our Site. Non-personal identification information may include the browser name, the type of computer and technical information about Users means of connection to our Site, such as the operating system and the Internet service providers utilized and other similar information.
PRIVACY-POLICY.INFORMATION-TEXT: ThreadsDownloader.social does not collect or store your data, period.
PRIVACY-POLICY.ADV-TEXT: Ads appearing on our site may be delivered to Users by advertising partners, who may set cookies. These cookies allow the ad server to recognize your computer each time they send you an online advertisement to compile non personal identification information about you or others who use your computer. This information allows ad networks to, among other things, deliver targeted advertisements that they believe will be of most interest to you. This privacy policy does not cover the use of cookies by any advertisers.
PRIVACY-POLICY.ADSENSE-TEXT: Some of the ads may be served by Google. Google's use of the DART cookie enables it to serve ads to Users based on their visit to our Site and other sites on the Internet. DART uses non personally identifiable information and does NOT track personal information about you, such as your name, email address, physical address, etc. You may opt out of the use of the DART cookie by visiting the Google ad and content network privacy policy at https://policies.google.com/technologies/ads
PRIVACY-POLICY.CHANGES-POLICY-TEXT: ThreadsDownloader.social has the discretion to update this privacy policy at any time. When we do, we will post a notification on the main page of our Site, revise the updated date at the bottom of this page. We encourage Users to frequently check this page for any changes to stay informed about how we are helping to protect the personal information we collect. You acknowledge and agree that it is your responsibility to review this privacy policy periodically and become aware of modifications.
PRIVACY-POLICY.YOUR-ACCEPT-TEXT: By using this Site, you signify your acceptance of this policy. If you do not agree to this policy, please do not use our Site. Your continued use of the Site following the posting of changes to this policy will be deemed your acceptance of those changes.
